---
title: "Travel"
---

If you are going from the airport, a the most convenient way is by bus.

### By bus

You can use [IDOS](https://www.harrachovcard.cz/en/summer/other-activities) bus operator. We recommend buying tickets in advance

Way from the airport:

1.  Take the bus from the airport AE 1042 to Prague main station
2.  Use metro B, Zličín to the final stop Černý most. You need to buy a 90-minute metro ticket (the journey takes 40 minutes without transfers)
3.  There is a bus station, here you can take the long-distance bus line 700 or 900

### By train

You can use [České dráhy](https://www.cd.cz/en/default.htm) railway operator.

Way from the airport:

1.  Praha Airport - bus line 100 to metro station Zličín
2.  Take the train to Harrachov.
3.  You must change trains at least once, in Tanvald. The actual number of transfers varies depending on the individual times

### By car

Approximate travel duration to Harrachov by car:

- from Prague airport \~2.5 hours (depending on rush hour, you take the D10) 
- from Dresden \~3 hours 
- from Wrocław \~2 hours
